GK16visa05cu:4: (vi, ka) vyaṅgyabhedāt kāvyabhedasya uktatvād vyaṅgyasya ca vyañjanāvṛttigamyatvād vyañjanāṃ pṛcchati---atha keyamiti /
GK16visa05cu:32: yatra ca svaśabdenābhidhānaṃ tatra pratyuta doṣa eveti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:35: abhihitānvayavādibhiraṅgīkṛtā tātparyākhyā vṛttirapi saṃsargamātre parikṣīṇā na vyaṅghyabodhinī /
GK16visa05cu:39: nanu rasādirabhidhayaiva bodhyatām ityata āhana ca saṃketita iti /
GK16visa05cu:40: nanu vibhāvādibhireva rasādibhāvādiḥ saṃketita eva ityatrāhana hīti /
GK16visa05cu:50: rasādirapi kathaṃ na saṃketita ityāśaṅkyāha---na ceti /
GK16visa05cu:53: yadi rasādeḥ saṃketitatvamucyate tat kiṃ vibhāvādivācakena śabdena ?
GK16visa05cu:56: svaśabdābhidhāne ca na tasya pratītiḥ kintu doṣa eva /
GK16visa05cu:60: mūrtimāniva madhau mugdho hariḥ kīḍatī“tyādau ca vibhāvādisāmagrayādeva tadvyañjakatvam na tu śṛṅgārādiśabdasya /
GK16visa05cu:66: (vi, gha) ubhayasiddhavācyārthasya bodhikā śaktirūpā vṛttireva vyaṅgyabodhikā,
GK16visa05cu:67: yathā dhanurdharamuktena iṣuṇā pratisaṃhitamekaṃ lakṣyaṃ dīrgheṇa vegarūpavyāpāreṇa
GK16visa05cu:68: bhittvā apratisaṃhitaṃ lakṣyāntaramapi dīrgatarībhūtena tenaiva vegarūpavyāpāreṇa
GK16visa05cu:70: yacca tātparyavṛttireva vyaṅgyabodhikā iti dhvanikasya matam,
GK16visa05cu:72: so 'yamityabhidhaiva vyaṅgyabodhiketi yat kaiściduktaṃ tatra so 'yamityabhidhānarūpeṣorvyāpāra ivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:75: ayamarthaḥ--yathā khalu dhanuṣmatā mukto bāṇa ekenaiva vegarūpavyāpāreṇa śatroḥ kavacādikamanekaṃ bhinatti,
GK16visa05cu:76: tathaika eva śabdasya vyāpāro yāvaduddeśyaṃ bodhayati /
GK16visa05cu:84: (vi, ṅa) yacca dhvaniketi---tātparyavyatirekāditi---vyañjakatvasya vyañjanāyāstātparyātatiriktatvād asau naṃ dhvanirna vyañjanā,
GK16visa05cu:96: tayorupari “śabdabuddhikarmaṇāṃ viramya vyāpārābhāvaḥ” iti vādibhireva pātanīyo daṇḍaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:102: kramaśo bodhe ca tatsattve viramya vyāpārabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:105: tātparyasattve vṛttibheda eva viramya vyāpāraḥ svīkriyate,
GK16visa05cu:106: na tu ekayā vṛttyā iti cenna /
GK16visa05cu:109: tasmāt kramaśo bodhena tātparyagrāhakābhāva eva tayorupari doṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:112: kramaśo vyañjanayā bodhane tu vaktṛboddhavāyadivaiśiṣṭyameva tātparyagrāhakam /
GK16visa05cu:113: na caivaṃ tadgrāhitaṃ tadevaṃ tātparyaṃ dhvanikamate vṛttirastu,
GK16visa05cu:115: yathā vā “surabhimāṃsaṃ bhuṅkṣva “iti sugandhimāṃsatātparyake vākye dhenumāṃsavyañjanā /
GK16visa05cu:128: (lo, ṛ) evaṃ ca yadi śabdaśruteranantaraṃ yāvānartho 'vagamyate tāvati śabdasyābhidhā eva vāyapāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:134: kanyā te garbhiṇī” ityādāvapi harṣaśokādīnāmapi na vācyatvam /
GK16visa05cu:137: (vi, ja) nanu na aṅgīkāryaiva lakṣaṇā ityata āha---kimiti ceti /
GK16visa05cu:151: tataśca kāvyaśabdānāṃ niratiśayasukhāsvādavyatirekeṇa pratipādyapratipādakayoḥ pravṛttyaupayikaprayojanānupalabdherniratiśayamukhāsvāda eva kāryatvenāvadhāryate /
GK16visa05cu:152: “yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ” iti nyāyāt” iti /
GK16visa05cu:155: (vi, jha) yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ “iti jaiminivākyameva vyaṅgyabodhane tātparyākhyavṛttau pramāṇamiti mataṃ dūṣayitumutthāpayati---yatpunariti
GK16visa05cu:161: tathā ca sukhāsvādakāraṇatā kāvyavākyasya vyaṅgyabodhadvāreṇaiva etadvākyasya vyaṅgyatātparyakatvāt /
GK16visa05cu:164: kāvyaprakāśe tu asya vākyasya bhinna evārthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:165: tathā hi--“yatparo yatsādhyatātparyakaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdasya prāmāṇyaniyāmakor'thaḥ na tu siddhaṃśe tasya śabdasya prāmāṇyam“iti /
GK16visa05cu:166: yathā,“gāmabhyāja“ityatra sādhyāṃśo 'bhyājanaṃ prāmāṇyaniyāmakor'tho na tu siddhagavāṃśaḥ; yathā vā,
GK16visa05cu:171: “yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ “iti vādino matamāśaṅkya dūṣayati---yatpunara iti /
GK16visa05cu:180: tasmānniratiśayasukhāsvādarūpo rasādirūpor'thaḥ śabdasya tātparyaviṣayo jātaḥ kiṃ vṛttyantarakalpanayeti /
GK16visa05cu:197: sa śabdārtha ityasya vākyasya tatparatvamarthaḥ tadeva tatparatvaṃ pṛcchati---kimidamiti /
GK16visa05cu:201: tadanyā vā iti tātparyākhyā vṛttiḥ saṃsargaṃ bodhayitvā vyaṅgyārthamapi bodhayatīti dhvanikena yaduktaṃ tacca prāgeva dūṣitam /
GK16visa05cu:211: nanvastu yugapadeva tātparyaśaktyā vibhāvādisaṃsargasya rasādeśca prakāśanam-iti cet ?
GK16visa05cu:218: (vi, ṭa) nanu atiriktapadārtharūpā turīyā vūttirdhvanikena nocyate,
GK16visa05cu:224: rasaniṣpattirityatra rasasya jñānaniṣpattireva niṣpattiḥ svaprakāśasya svajñānābhinnatvāt /
GK16visa05cu:234: kiñca, “yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ“iti nyāyamaṅgīkurvatāṃ vyañjanānaṅgīkāre vānīrakuñja
GK16visa05cu:235: ityādau guṇībhūtaḥ pratīyamānor'thaḥ prathamamavataran śabdasya tatparatvābhāvāt
GK16visa05cu:243: “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādau taṭādyarthamātrabodhaviratāyā lakṣaṇāyāśca kutaḥ śītatvapāvanatvādivyaṅgyabodhakatā /
GK16visa05cu:259: (vi, ḍa) nanu abhidhā lakṣaṇā ca dīrghatarībhūtaiva vyaṅgyārthaṃ bodhayatu,
GK16visa05cu:261: śabdasya viramyavyāpārastu bhavanmate vyaṅgyabodhana iva svīkārya ityato vaidharmyādeva vācyavyaṅgyabodhakavyāpārayorbhedaṃ sādhayati /
GK16visa05cu:272: bhinno 'bhidheyato vyaṅgya iti---yadyapi abhidhāvyañjanayoreva bhedaḥ pradarśanīyaḥ,
GK16visa05cu:273: tathāpi tadbhedapradarśanenaiva tadvodhakasyāpi bhedaḥ pradarśita ityāśayena itthamuktam /
GK16visa05cu:287: vaiyākaraṇa hi padasya padavācyārthasya jñānamātre nipuṇāḥ,
GK16visa05cu:301: vidhirūpe vācye jñāte sati niṣedhirūpatayā vyaṅgyo jñāyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:307: “gato 'stakarkaḥ” ityādau ca vācyor'tha eka eva pratīyate /
GK16visa05cu:336: “kassa va ṇa hoi roso daṭṭhūṇapiāeṃ savvaṇaṃ aharaṃ /
GK16visa05cu:342: (vi, da) viṣayabhedaṃ darśayati---“kassa vā ṇa hoi'; iti /
GK16visa05cu:343: kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ savraṇamadharam ?
GK16visa05cu:348: upanāyakadaṣṭādharāṃ patnīṃ tarjayantaṃ prati nāyikāsakhyāḥ pratāraṇoktiriyam /
GK16visa05cu:357: nāyikayā hi pratīyate iyaṃ pratārayatītyevaṃ vyaṅgyārthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:360: (lo, i) kassa vā ṇeti---vāritādarthād vāme pratikūlakāriṇi /
GK16visa05cu:365: evaṃ boddhṛsvarūpādibhede 'pi yadi vācyavyaṅgyayorekatvaṃ tadā kvacidapi nīlapītādau narapuṅgavādau bhedo na syādityāśayaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:366: nanu gato 'stamarka ityādivākye prakaraṇādirūpajñāpakāntarasahāyenaiva bodhitasya kāntamabhisaretyādivyaṅgyārthasya kathaṃ śabdapramāṇabodhyatvam,
GK16visa05cu:368: iti cedatra kecidāhuḥ-yathā śabdabodhitasya kvacid vācyasyārthasya satyāsatyatvajijñāsāyāṃ satyatvamanumānaviṣaya iti śabdānumānapramāṇayorbhinnaviṣayatvam
GK16visa05cu:369: vyaṅgyastu eva eva śabdapramāṇena prakaraṇādibodhya iti dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭānti kayorvaiṣamyam /
GK16visa05cu:372: śabdasya ekavyaṅgye prakaraṇadisāhāyyasyeti kartavyatārūpatayā śabdasyāṅgatvaṃ svāṅgasya
GK16visa05cu:374: iha ca yadyapi vākyārthasya pratītyanantaraṃ tasya satyāsatyatvajijñāsāyāṃ satyatvaṃ pramāṇāntareṇānumānenaiva bodhyate,
GK16visa05cu:375: tathāpi satyāsatyatvajijñāsātaḥ pūrvamupapannāyā vākyārthapramāyā apramābhāvāt śabdaikasamadhigamyatvācca na śabdaprāmāṇyavyākopaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:376: na hi cakṣurādinā pratītau satyāsatyatvapratyakṣaprāmāṇyaṃ vyākupyeta /
GK16visa05cu:390: (vi, dha) rasādibodhikā na lakṣaṇā nāpi abhidhā sambhavatītyāha--prāgasattvāditi /
GK16visa05cu:391: tatkāvyasthaśabdajanyo yo rasastasya śabdabodhānantarameva janyamānatvāt tatprāk tasyāsattvāt tatra tatkāvyasthaśabdasya śakterlakṣaṇāyā vā
GK16visa05cu:393: nanu kāvyāt prathamamanubhūyamāno yo rasastanniṣṭhasāmānyadharmarūpayā sāmānyalakṣaṇayā upasthite bhāvinyapi rase śaktigraho 'stviti cenna /
GK16visa05cu:394: śaktyā lakṣaṇayā vā prāthamikarasabodhasyaiva tatsambhavāt prāk tasyānupasthitatvāt vibhāvādivācakaśabdānāṃtatra śaktigrahakatvābhāvāccetyapi bodhyam /
GK16visa05cu:399: kintu vibhāvādyabhidhānadvāraiva tatpratīterānubhāvikatvāt nanu iha kāvyasthāt śṛṅgārādiśabdājjñātasya
GK16visa05cu:406: trayāṇāmapi vyaṅgyānāṃ mukhyārthabādhavirahādapi na lakṣaṇā bodhiketi /
GK16visa05cu:411: kiṃñca, yatra“gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādāvupāttaśabdārthānāṃ bubhūṣannevānvayo 'nupapattyā bādhyate tatraiva hi lakṣaṇāyāḥ praveśaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:414: (vi, na) nanu rase 'pi tātparyasattvāllakṣaṇāṃ vinā tadanirvāha eva mukhyārthabādha ucyata ityata āha--na hīti /
GK16visa05cu:415: yadi rasādiśabdāttasya prāgupasthitistadaiva tasya lakṣaṇayā bodhārthamuktarūpamukhyārthabādhanirvacanaṃ saiva tu netyarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:440: ityādau padārthānāmanvayakāla eva bādhapratibhāsādyanvayasya vidhurībhāvastadā tena padārthena jalamayādinā ākṣipto yastaṭādistena saṅgatiranvaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:447: ityādau śūnyavāsagṛhādīnāṃ vilokanādyanvayābādhāt na rasalakṣaṇetyaha--na punariti /
GK16visa05cu:452: yadi ca “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādau prayojanaṃ lakṣyaṃ syāt,
GK16visa05cu:454: tasyāpi ca lakṣyatayā prayojanāntaraṃ tasyāpi prayojanāntaramityanavasthāpātaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:459: ityādau yat śaityapāvanatvaṃ ca vyaṅgyamuktaṃ tīralakṣaṇānantaraṃ tatrāpi lakṣaṇaivāstu;
GK16visa05cu:463: mukhyārthatvaṃ bādhitatvaṃ ca syāditi---ubhayameva tu nāstīti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:467: (lo, ḷ) nanvevaṃ vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau māstu lakṣaṇā;
GK16visa05cu:468: avivakṣitavācye tu śītatvapāvanatvādirūpaṃ prayojanaṃ lakṣaṇīyamastitvatyāśaṅkyāha---yadi ceti /
GK16visa05cu:469: śabdo hi prathamaṃ mukhyamarthaṃ pratipādya tasya vākyārthānvayānupapattau tatsambandhinamarthaṃ lakṣayati /
GK16visa05cu:470: iha yadi tīrapratyayānantaraṃ bodhyaṃ prayojanaṃ lakṣayati tadā gaṅgāśabdasya tīraṃ mukhyor'thaḥ syāt /
GK16visa05cu:476: “anavasthā yā mūlakṣatikāriṇī“mūlaṃ hyatra tīraniṣṭasya pāvanatvasya ca pūrvapakṣeṇa lakṣyatvenāṅgīkāraḥ /
GK16visa05cu:479: na cāpi prayojanaviśiṣṭa eva tīre lakṣaṇā /
GK16visa05cu:481: nīlādisaṃvedanānantarameva hi jñātatāyā anuvyavasāyasya vā saṃbhavaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:484: (vi, bha) nanu lakṣyārthabodhānantaraṃ yadi prayojane lakṣaṇā tadaivānavasthā;
GK16visa05cu:485: śītapāvane tīre ghoṣa ityevaṃ prayojanaviśiṣṭa eva lakṣaṇāstvityata āha---na cāpīti /
GK16visa05cu:486: tatra gaṅgātīre ghoṣa ityato 'dhikārthasya pratītiḥ prayojanamiti kāvyaprakāśakṛduktaṃ prayojanamanusandheyam /
GK16visa05cu:494: iti cet--lakṣaṇayā yatpāvanatvaviśiṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ janayitavyaṃ tatprayojanībhūtaṃ jñānaṃ
GK16visa05cu:495: ca tadeva paryavasitamityataḥ kāryakāraṇayorabhedāpattireva bījamiti sarvatra tu
GK16visa05cu:499: naiyāyikānāṃ murāreśca mate 'nuvyavasāyaḥ tādṛśakāryakāraṇayośca kramotpattireva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:503: iha caitadviśiṣṭameva taṭaṃ lakṣaṇā bodhayatu kiṃ vṛttyantareṇa ?
GK16visa05cu:505: gaṅgātādātmyapratītyā ca taṭasya daivasiddhameva śaityādiviśiṣṭatvamityāśaṅkyāha--na cāpīti---prayojanaviśiṣṭe 'pi lakṣaṇaityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:509: ābhāsatvena hetūnāṃ smṛtirna ca rasādidhīḥ // VisSd_5.4 //
GK16visa05cu:515: rasādīnāṃ ratyādīnāṃ vyaṅgyānāṃ bodhanakṣamaṃ bodhakāraṇaṃ nānumānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:520: kintu śabdānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyatvena vyañjanayā śābdabodhaviṣayo ratyādirbhāvukairbhāvyamānaḥ svaprakāśānandamayatvena pariṇata āsvādyamāno rasaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:523: tathā ca tādṛśarasasya hetūnāṃ ratyādikāryakāraṇasahakārirūpāṇāṃ vibhāvādānāmābhāsatvena nānumānaṃ nānumitirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:524: tathā hi vibhāvādayaḥ sītādayo hetavo mutubarthadidṛkṣādisambandhena rāmādivṛttayaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:525: sādhyastūktarūpo rasaḥ kāvyaboddhaniṣṭha ityato hetūnāṃ viruddhatvamasiddhiśceti hetvābhāsatā /
GK16visa05cu:527: rasādibuddhiḥ smṛtirūpāpi netyāha--smṛtirna ca rasādidhīḥ iti /
GK16visa05cu:533: (lo, ai) evaṃ vyaṅgyasyāsya prācīnavedyatvaṃ nirasya mahimabhaṭṭena khalu rasavastvalaṅkāravyañjakānāṃ
GK16visa05cu:536: vyaktivivekakāreṇa hi--“yāpi vibhāvādibhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ sānumāna evāntarbhavitumarhati /
GK16visa05cu:538: te hi ratyādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ kāraṇakāryasahakāribhūtāstānanumāpayanta eva rasādīnniṣpādayanti /
GK16visa05cu:539: ta eva pratīyamānā āsvādapadavī gatāḥ santo lasā ucyante,
GK16visa05cu:549: ta eva anumīyamānā ratyādaya eva punaḥ punaranuśīlanādāsvādyapadavīṃ gatāḥ santo jñānasambandhena sāmājikaniṣṭharasatāmāpadyanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:556: kintu vibhāvādibhireva ratyādirvyajyata ityave bhramo jāyata ityāha---yato 'yamadyāpīti /
GK16visa05cu:576: ratyāderanumānaṃ vyañjanā ceti vivādo nāpātata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:577: tadaivātra vivādaḥ syād yadā rāmādigataratyādivyañjanaṃ mayā rasatvenoktasyāt,
GK16visa05cu:580: tataśca vyaṅgyaratyādireva sāmājikaratyādāvabhedenā'pyamāṇo rasanākhyavyāpāreṇāsvādyamāno rasa iti rasanirūpaṇaprastāvoktasiddhāntaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:595: “yatra yatraivaṃvidhānāṃ vibhāvānubhāvasāttvikasañcāriṇāmabhidhānamabhinayo vā tatra tatra śṛṅgārādirasāvirbhāvaḥ” iti sugrahaiva vyāptiḥ pakṣadharmatā ca /
GK16visa05cu:598: (vi, va) vyaktivivekakāreṇa sambandhaviśeṣaṇavibhāvādīnāṃ yathoktānandarūpasavyāpyatā pakṣadharmatā ca sādhyate,
GK16visa05cu:609: (lo, au) atra mahimabhaṭṭadarśitāṃ vyāptiṃ dūṣayitvā vyāptigrahaṇābhāvaṃ draḍhayati--yaccetyādi /
GK16visa05cu:620: arthāntarasya rasasyābhivyaktau āsvādane nibandhanakāraṇaṃ vo yuṣmākaṃ yā sāmagrīṣṭā saiva vibhāvādirūpā sāmagrī no 'smākaṃ mate gamakatvena anumāpakatvena sammateryarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:623: arthāntarābhivyaktau yā sāmagrī kāraṇam iṣṭā saivāsmākamanumitau liṅgamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:624: sāmagrībhāve 'pi hi vyaṅgyārthapratipattau yataḥ kutaścidapi yadeva tadeva pratīyate /
GK16visa05cu:626: tasya vyāptigrahaṇaṃ vinā ābhāsataiva syāditi bhavatāmapi vyāptigrahaṇaṃ vinā vyaṅgyajñānaṃ na sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:643: vastutastu sāmājike sātrātkriyamāṇaḥ svaprakāśānando 'numīyata eva na,
GK16visa05cu:647: tathā jñātavibhāvādirūpā sāmagrī rasāboddhurjanasyāpyastīti vyabhicāraśceti bodhyam /
GK16visa05cu:662: (vi, sa) yatra vastuno 'laṅkārasya vā vyañjanā tatra vastvalaṅkārau anumānagamyau eveti naiyāyikamataṃ dūṣayitumutthāmapayati---yacceti /
GK16visa05cu:669: jalakelau śrīkṛṣṇena svīyakaradattajalena rādhikāmukhacandraṃ punaḥ purabhiṣicya svīyakareṇa pidhīyate ca mucyate ca /
GK16visa05cu:671: pidhāne rātrau virahiṇastasya prātaḥ kālabhramāt saṃghaṭanam,
GK16visa05cu:675: tatkarasya jalakelitaralatve kṛṣṇamukhasyaiva sicyamānatvasambhavena svamukhasya pidhānāyogāt /
GK16visa05cu:676: yad vā--rādhikāreṇa pidhānamocanayorapi jalasekadvārā kṛṣṇakaraprayojyatvāttaddvārā kṛṣṭakareṇaiva pidhānamocane /
GK16visa05cu:678: atra śloke mukhe candrarūpaṇam ādipadadvayāt ślokāntare alaṅkārāntaramityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:680: (lo, i) evaṃ rasāderanumānāgocaratvaṃ vyavasthāpya vastvalaṅkārayorapi vyaṅgyayostaddarśayati---yacceti /
GK16visa05cu:686: rādhikāmukhasya candratvasya vyaṅgyatvāccandradarśanādarśanābhāyāṃ hi rātrisadbhāvābhāvabuddhyā cakavākayorvighanasaṃghaṭane bhavataḥ /
GK16visa05cu:691: (vi, ha) tatra vasturūpaṃ vyaṅgyamupakramya tasyānumeyatāṃ ghaṭayati---tathā hīti /
GK16visa05cu:696: pakṣe parvatādau sapakṣe mahānasādau ca vipakṣe jalahradādau vvāvṛttatvam /
GK16visa05cu:697: liṅgād vyāpyād dhūmādeḥ liṅgini vyāpake vahnyādau /
GK16visa05cu:704: (vi, ka) liṅgyasya trirūpatā ca sādhyavyāptisattve eva sambhavatīti /
GK16visa05cu:718: tasmādatra yadvācyārthālliṅgarūpālliṅgino vyaṅgyārthasyāvagamastadanumāna eva paryavasyati” iti /
GK16visa05cu:728: pakṣe godāvarītīranikuñjarūpe āśraye sāmarthyādavaseya iti na khalu sapakṣasattvavipakṣavyāvṛttatvābhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:731: tanna, tathā hyatra “bhama ammia-” ityādau (242 pṛdṛ)
GK16visa05cu:732: gṛhe śvanivṛttyā vihitaṃ bhramaṇaṃ godāvarītīre siṃhopalabdherabhramaṇamanumāpayati” iti yadvaktavyaṃ tatrānaikāntiko hetuḥ /
GK16visa05cu:743: kuto na yuktamityāha--tathā hīti atra--gṛhe iti /
GK16visa05cu:744: ayamarthaḥ--yasya khalu bhīrorgṛhe śvanivṛttyā bhramaṇaṃ vihitaṃ sa kathaṃ saṃhopalabdhisthāne bhramiṣyati /
GK16visa05cu:747: bhīrorapi guroḥ prabhorvā nideśena priyānurāgeṇa vā gamanasya saṃbhavāt,
GK16visa05cu:748: puścalyā vacanaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ na veti saṃdigdhāsiddheśca /
GK16visa05cu:755: pakṣe godāvarītīre hetoḥ siṃhasattvasya sandehāt sāndigdhāsiddhirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:760: kiñca ya khalu vīraḥ sparśādiśaṅkayā śuno bibheti sa saṃhasadbhāvasthānaṃ pratyuta mṛgayādikutūhalena gacchatīti darśanādviruddho bhramaṇarūpasādhyaviruddhasya sādhanāt /
GK16visa05cu:762: “jalakeli-” ityatra “ya ātmadarśanādarśanābhyāṃ cakravākavighaṭasaṃghaṭanakārī sa candra eva” ityanumitireveyamiti na vācyam,
GK16visa05cu:775: (lo, ḷ) uttrāsakaḥ--yasya karatāladānādinotrāsena pakṣiṇo na ghaṭante,
GK16visa05cu:784: ābhāsamāna ābhāsau hetorupalabhyamāno vyabhicāraḥ kokatrāsakavṛttiḥ svadarśanādarśanarūpaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:802: (vi, cha) ślokāntarepi vyaṅgyāntarasyānumeyatāṃ hetorvyabhicāreṇa dūṣayitumāha--tathā yaddṛṣṭimiti /
GK16visa05cu:805: iyaṃ parakāmukopabhogecchāvatī nalagranthinā stanadāraṇasambhāvanāsattve 'pi strotogamane ekākipravṛttatvād iti /
GK16visa05cu:806: granthakṛtastu stanāghātastrotogamanayoḥ pṛthakkathane 'pa na pṛthak hetudvayam /
GK16visa05cu:820: (vi, ja) niḥ śeṣacyutetyādāvapi dūtyāstatkāmukopabhogasya vyaṅgyasyānumeyatāṃ dūṣayitumāha---yacceti /
GK16visa05cu:826: (vi, jha) ādyayorna vivāda iti---dūtikartṛkamanumānaṃ tāvanna sambhavatyeva,
GK16visa05cu:828: tatkāle sannihatajanastu yadi na vyaṅgyaboddhā tadā tasyānumānamapi nāstītyatastatrāpi navivādaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:829: yadi tu vyaṅgyaboddhā tadā tṛtīyapakṣe evāntarbhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:833: tadviraheṇektasya candanacyavanāderupabhogavyāpyatā nāstīti tatraiva vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:835: (lo, o) na vivāda iti---na khalu vayaṃ dūtyāstatkalasannihitānāṃ vānumānaṃ nirākurmaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:840: nanu vaktrādyavasthāsahakṛtatvena viśeṣyo heturiti na vācyam /
GK16visa05cu:849: (lo, au) nanviti---vaktrī yādṛśīmavasthāṃ prāpya tathoktavatī sāvasthā hetorviśeṣaṇīkartavyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:859: kiñcaivaṃvidhānāṃ kāvyānāṃ kavipratibhāmātrajanmanāṃ prāmāṇyānāvaśyakatvena saṃdigdhāsiddhatvaṃ hetoḥ /
GK16visa05cu:870: tena ca tatkāntasyādhamatvaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ na veti kathamanumānam /
GK16visa05cu:873: (vi, ḍa) nanu vyabhicāriṇa sandigdhena vā candanacyavanādinā kathamupabhogasya bhavanmate vyañjanāpītyata āha---vyaktivādinā ceti /
GK16visa05cu:876: na hyanumāna iva vyañjanāyāmapi vyabhicārādikamaṅgamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:877: anumānapakṣe adhamasaninahitapreṣitatve satīti viśeṣaṇadānamapi na sambhavatītyāha---tena ceti /
GK16visa05cu:880: adhamatvasya prāmāṇikatvepi tasya dūtīgamanecchārāditye sati tāvatāpyanumānāsambhava ityapi bodhyam /
GK16visa05cu:905: (lo, ī) yadi khalu pūrvaṃ jīvataḥ kutrāpi sthānamavagacchet /
GK16visa05cu:906: arthapattisvarūpaṃ hi--dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā anyathā nopapadyate iti,
GK16visa05cu:909: pratyakṣānumānopamānārthāpattyabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ pañcabhiḥ pramāṇairupalabdhaḥ śabdasya ca prādhānyakhyāpanārthaṃ bhedena nirdiśati--śruta iti /
GK16visa05cu:910: śruta iti śabdalakṣaṇena jñātor'thor'thaviśeṣo 'nyathā nopapadyata iti /
GK16visa05cu:911: śābdī hyākāṅkṣā śabdenaiva prapūryata iti darśanāt /
GK16visa05cu:913: ityatra rātrau bhuṅkte iti vākyaśeṣaḥ kalpyate /
GK16visa05cu:918: śabdo hi kalpyater'thapratītyai viprakṛtasādhanaṃ tadvaram arthe eva kalpyatāmiti /
GK16visa05cu:927: jīvaṃścaitro 'tra goṣṭhyāṃ na vidyata ityatra kutrāpyavasthāne pūrvānubhavyāptimupajīvyaivārthāpatteḥ pravṛttiriti /
GK16visa05cu:936: (vi, ta) sūcanā nāma kaścid vyāpāraḥ kaiściducyate tadgamya eva vyaṅgyārthaḥ iti mataṃ dūṣayitumāha---kiñceti /
GK16visa05cu:940: tathā ca yadyaṅgulitolanādau vyabhicāraśaṅkā na bhavati tatrānumānam /
GK16visa05cu:945: saṃketādilaukikapramāṇāsāpekṣatvenetyanena yatra yatrāṃ rdhvatarjanī tatra tatra daśaṃsakhyeti punargṛhītavyāptiruraskāravacanam /
GK16visa05cu:951: (vi, tha) rasādibuddheḥ smṛtirūpatvaṃ saṃskārajanyatvenānumanyamānānāṃ mataṃ duṣayitumāha---tatrāpīti /
GK16visa05cu:954: kintu svaprakāśānandasvarūpasya rasasya smṛtītvāsambhava eva doṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:956: (lo, ū) smṛtirna ca rasādidhīḥ itikārikāpadārthaṃ viśadayati--yañceti /
GK16visa05cu:957: anaikāntikatvaṃ so 'yaṃ devadatta ityādijñānarūpāyāḥ pratyabhijñāyā api saṃskārajanyatvāt
GK16visa05cu:960: ca dvitāyārtho nāstyeva---iti yaduktaṃ mahimabhaṭaṭena tadanubhavasiddhimapalapato gajanimīlikaiva /
GK16visa05cu:963: (vi, da) dvitīyārtho maheśarūpo nāstyeveti---buddhiviṣayo nāstyevetyarthaḥ apalapata ityasya,
GK16visa05cu:967: (lo, ṛ) gajanimīlikaiveti--paryālocanaṃ vināpi lokāpavādaśaṅkayā mattagajavaccakṣuṣī nimilya vacanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:970: cānumānādipramāṇāvedyatayā cābhidhādivṛttitrayābodhyatayā ca turīyā vṛttirupāsyaiveti siddham /
GK16visa05cu:976: iyaṃ ca vyāptyādyanusandhānaṃ vināpi bhavatītyakhilaṃ nirmalam /
GK16visa05cu:979: (lo, ḷ) na ca śabdasamarpitasya vibhāvāderjñānasyaiva rasāderjanakatvāt kāvyamatra sākṣānna hetutvena vyāpriyata iti vācyam;
GK16visa05cu:981: bhāvakatvāt yathā svārthasya jñānadvāreṇa tatsaṃsargaṃ bhāvayatāṃ padānāmeva karaṇatvābhāyupagamo
GK16visa05cu:983: kiñca sadvārakaraṇam iti nyāyenāntarālavartivyāpārāntaravirahādasambhāvyaṃ vibhāvādisaṃvalanajñānasyāsvādaṃ prati kāraṇatvam /
GK16visa05cu:984: nanvevaṃ vyāptyādyanusandhānamantareṇākasmād vācyārthasyāvagatau kathaṃ nātiprasaṅga ityāśaṅkyāha--iyaṃ ceti /
GK16visa05cu:989: rasavyaktau punarvṛttiṃ rasanākhyāṃ pare viduḥ // VisSd_5.5 //
GK16visa05cu:993: (vi, dha) rasavyañjanāyā rasanetyapi nāma kecidāhurityāha---rasavyaktau punariti /
GK16visa05cu:997: smṛtyupanayasahakāreṇa bodhanaṃ tu vyaṅgyārthasya pūvānubhavābhāvena smaraṇāsambhāvanayaiva nirastam /
GK16visa05cu:998: nahyuktānandarūpo raso dūtyādeḥ kāmukasambhogādirūpor'tho vā pūrvamanubhūtaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:1006: iti sāhityadarpaṇalocane vyañjanāvyāpārasthāpano nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ
GK16visa05cu:1008: iti sahityarpaṇo vyañjanāvyāpāranirūpaṇo nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ /
